channel.title: Pvp problem
channel.description:
Okay, I'm using Cammy Pvp. You guys all know what source that is and you know how it is safe inside the bank. Well, i also want to change the spot and i don't know how to make safe zones. i prefer t.v. so i can learn and in the future i can manage by myself.
-Thank you Moparscape-

item.title: Pvp problem
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

public boolean inSpoonFeed() { if(absX > # && absX <# && absY > # && absY < #) { return true; } return false; }

in the inWild boolean

if (!inSpoodFeed()) return true;

I won’t tell you anything else.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp problem
item.dc:creator: @Pro4Show Pro4Show
item.description:
@Pro4Show wrote:

i understand that. but most of my coding experience has been gained by me watching others.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp problem
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

We shouldn’t have to do it for you, you should look up guides. He just told you to find the South-West corner and North-East Corner then put those in and it will work. We shouldn’t have to spoon feed you. If you are willing to learn we are willing to teach. We just don’t want you to be babied through the whole thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp problem
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Find the south west coords and north east coords and make it so if you’re within them it’s a safe zone. I think that’s what you asked…

Read full topic
